about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know me better
about.paragraph1: I'm a passionate .NET Backend Developer with over 3 years of professional experience building scalable, high-performance enterprise applications. My expertise lies in crafting robust backend systems using modern .NET technologies and cloud platforms.
about.paragraph2: Throughout my career, I've worked with diverse teams to deliver mission-critical applications that serve thousands of users daily. I specialize in API development, microservices architecture, and database optimization, always focusing on clean code principles and performance.
about.paragraph3: When I'm not coding, I enjoy staying up-to-date with the latest .NET ecosystem developments, contributing to open-source projects, and sharing knowledge with the developer community. I believe in continuous learning and always strive to improve my skills.
about.apiDevelopmentDesc: Building robust, scalable RESTful APIs using ASP.NET Core with proper authentication, validation, and documentation.
about.databaseDesignDesc: Designing efficient database schemas and implementing optimized queries using Entity Framework Core and SQL Server.
about.cloudSolutionsDesc: Deploying and managing applications on Azure with containers, microservices, and serverless architectures.
